item.title: There must be an easier way... survey questions in R
item.description: So I have this great little custom function I’ve used when looking at survey data in R. I call this function pull(). The goal of pull() is to quickly produce frequency tables with n sizes from individual-level survey data. Before using pull(), I create a big table that includes information about the survey questions I want to pull. The data are structured like this: quest
